name: Sacred Heart
description:
Classic side-scrolling beat 'em up like in your childhood days at Round Table. Made by 3 dudes + Randy in one week for PIGSquad's Summer Slow Jams.

It's up to JD, Turk, Elliot and Carla to stop The Todd and his group of medical intern cronies from taking over Sacred Heart! Combos, throw-downs, secret dance moves?? Let it begin!

* it's a game jam, there may be some bugs - if you find any let us know so we can fix them!

Arcade. It's "Occult Classic".

Summer Slow Jams - Arcade Jam: Occult Theme - June 2019 Entry

Credits:

Andrew - Code / Design

Ken - Environment / UI
